flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
This Circuit Skills video by Collin Cunningham is just scraping the surface. I want to show you how to actually make

the thing. The LED Color Organ kit from Jameco and Makershed is not a PCB, but a Protoboard and a bunch of parts. With this great kit, you can make sweet, sweet old-time sound-to-light music. After you finish this guide, you can switch off the lights, crank up the tunes, and watch the awesome seizure-inducing light show!

lines.text: Will begin guide when I myself get my kit
